sentence.Network_en: Because of the snowstorm, the churchgoer did not go to church.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为暴风雪, 经常去做礼拜的人没有去教堂.

sentence.Network_en: He was a very good family man and an ardent churchgoer.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个非常好的居家男人和一个忠诚的经常参加礼拜的人.

sentence.Network_en: Being a very pious churchgoer, she visits church, rain and voluntarily takes part in every ceremony.
sentence.Network_cn: 做为一个虔诚的教徒, 她无论晴天雨天都会自愿参加每一个宗教仪式.

list.abs: as churchgoers , they felt a sense of responsibility to others .身为教徒，他们觉得自己对别人有一种责任感。

entry.tran: 按时去教堂做礼拜的人
entry.def: A churchgoer is a person who goes to church regularly.

means.word_mean: 1. a religious person who goes to church regularly
